messages.subject: Squirrel and Grape vine motif
messages.msgSnippet: Curious if anyone has any fuchi/kashira, etc., depicting the squirrel and grapevine motif that they have good photos of. Working on an article about that
messages.messageBody:
Curious if anyone has any fuchi/kashira, etc., depicting the "squirrel and grapevine" motif that they have good photos of. Working on an article about that motif...could use a few more photos other than what resides here.

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
